title: Moonlight on the Snowfield - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Character Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Economics   Fallen Nobility   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Management   Master-Servant Relationship   Royalty   Selfless Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Unconditional Love
author: Tsukiya   月夜
description: The world was comprised of 17 countries and 5 races. Afflicted by a disease, the crown prince of Rintz Kingdom in Schell continent, Ernst, was stripped of his rights to the throne and made the lord of the poorest fief, Meissen. The citizens of Meissen lived a destitute life in extreme poverty. For the sake of the citizens living now, as well as the citizens who were yet to be born, Ernst will sow the seeds for their future.>
